name: Remembering Pearl Harbor
description: This original immersive virtual-reality project is told through the voice of Lt. James Downing, who at 103 is the second-oldest living American veteran to have witnessed that day, and is geared towards audiences of all ages.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7,8.1, 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Graphics: GPU: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
